name: Mini Brake
description: remotely controlled bike brake for kids
overview: MiniBrake is a remotely controlled bike brake for kids. MiniBrake consists of two parts: a remote controller in your hand and a brake fixed on the rear wheel of your child’s bike. With the help of the remote controller, parents are able to protect their children (aged 2-5) from a probable accident by a press of a button. The remote controller sends a signal to the brake attached to the rear wheell of the bike, which brings the bike to a safe stop within 1-2 meters. The device has a signal panel that indicates the level of batteries, therefore parents can always use the MiniBrake in a safe way.
